superheroes.name: Batman
superheroes.bio: Batman is a fictional superhero appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. The character was created by artist Bob Kane and writer Bill Finger, and first appeared in Detective Comics #27 in 1939.

superheroes.name: Superman
superheroes.bio: Superman is a fictional superhero. The character was created by writer Jerry Siegel and artist Joe Shuster, and first appeared in Action Comics #1, a comic book published on April 18, 1938.

superheroes.name: Spiderman
superheroes.bio: Spiderman is a fictional superhero. The character was created by writer Stan Lee and artist Steve Ditko, and first appeared in Amazing Fantasy #15, a comic book published on August 10, 1962.

superheroes.name: Thor
superheroes.bio: Thor is a fictional superhero. The character was created by writer Stan Lee and artist Jack Kirby, and first appeared in Journey into Mystery #83, a comic book published on August 28, 1962.

superheroes.name: Wonder Woman
superheroes.bio: Wonder Woman is a fictional superhero. The character was created by writer William Moulton Marston and artist Harry G. Peter, and first appeared in All Star Comics #8, a comic book published on October 21, 1941.

superheroes.name: Hulk
superheroes.bio: Hulk is a fictional superhero. The character was created by writer Stan Lee and artist Jack Kirby, and first appeared in The Incredible Hulk #1, a comic book published on May 1, 1962.

superheroes.name: Captain America
superheroes.bio: Captain America is a fictional superhero. The character was created by writer Joe Simon and artist Jack Kirby, and first appeared in Captain America Comics #1, a comic book published on March 1, 1941.

superheroes.name: IronMan
superheroes.bio: IronMan is a fictional superhero. The character was created by writer Stan Lee and artist Don Heck, and first appeared in Tales of Suspense #39, a comic book published on March 1, 1963.

superheroes.name: Black Widow
superheroes.bio: Black Widow is a fictional superhero. The character was created by writer Stan Lee and artist Don Heck, and first appeared in Tales of Suspense #52, a comic book published on April 1, 1964.

superheroes.name: Black Panther
superheroes.bio: Black Panther is a fictional superhero. The character was created by writer Stan Lee and artist Jack Kirby, and first appeared in Fantastic Four #52, a comic book published on July 1, 1966.

superheroes.name: AntMan
superheroes.bio: AntMan is a fictional superhero. The character was created by writer Stan Lee and artist Larry Lieber, and first appeared in Tales to Astonish #27, a comic book published on January 1, 1962.

superheroes.name: Wolverine
superheroes.bio: Wolverine is a fictional superhero. The character was created by writer Roy Thomas and artist Len Wein, and first appeared in The Incredible Hulk #180, a comic book published on October 1, 1974.

superheroes.name: Deadpool
superheroes.bio: Deadpool is a fictional superhero. The character was created by writer Fabian Nicieza and artist Rob Liefeld, and first appeared in The New Mutants #98, a comic book published on February 1, 1991.

superheroes.name: Flash
superheroes.bio: Flash is a fictional superhero. The character was created by writer Gardner Fox and artist Harry Lampert, and first appeared in Flash Comics #1, a comic book published on January 1, 1940.

superheroes.name: Green Lantern
superheroes.bio: Green Lantern is a fictional superhero. The character was created by writer Bill Finger and artist Martin Nodell, and first appeared in All-American Comics #16, a comic book published on July 1, 1940.

superheroes.name: Aquaman
superheroes.bio: Aquaman is a fictional superhero. The character was created by writer Mort Weisinger and artist Paul Norris, and first appeared in More Fun Comics #73, a comic book published on November 1, 1941.

superheroes.name: Cyborg
superheroes.bio: Cyborg is a fictional superhero. The character was created by writer Marv Wolfman and artist George PÃ©rez, and first appeared in DC Comics Presents #26, a comic book published on October 1, 1980.

superheroes.name: Green Arrow
superheroes.bio: Green Arrow is a fictional superhero. The character was created by writer Mort Weisinger and artist George Papp, and first appeared in More Fun Comics #73, a comic book published on November 1, 1941.

superheroes.name: Martian Manhunter
superheroes.bio: Martian Manhunter is a fictional superhero. The character was created by writer Joseph Samachson and artist Joe Certa, and first appeared in Detective Comics #225, a comic book published on November 1, 1955.

superheroes.name: shazam
superheroes.bio: Shazam is a fictional superhero. The character was created by writer Bill Parker and artist C. C. Beck, and first appeared in Whiz Comics #2, a comic book published on February 1, 1940.
